snippet: The writer and horticulturist Umberto Pasti believes that to make a garden, you must abandon yourself not only to your surroundings, but to your deepest desires.
abstract: The writer and horticulturist Umberto Pasti believes that to make a garden, you must abandon yourself not only to your surroundings, but to your deepest desires.

headline.main: Gardener, to Thine Own Self Be True
headline.print_headline: Gardener, to Thine Own Self Be True
